entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pinawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pinawa 07:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -32

Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
